game.name: Calabash Bros
game.description:
With a huge range of upgrades and multiple modes, Calabash Bros is a highly challenging and beautifully-designed tower defense game. In order to defeat your enemies, you have to build defensive turrets, magic towers, barracks and freeze towers. Three difficulty settings and three unique modes are included in each level.

In this cool adventure game, you have to take the charge of making the best defense to build towers that would help prevent the enemies from passing there. You would get the money for killing every soldier. You can use this money to purchase stronger and defensive towers.

The lands of Calabash Bros are threatened by a horde of strange and vicious creatures. Building the finest range of towers would help you to protect the territory from the sudden enemy attack. You are free to call down lightning strike or meteor shower for extra devastation. In addition to this, there is no loss in summoning a skilled soldier in order to make a last stand.

The Calabash brothers are going through the unexpected big danger in this new war game. Hordes of monsters have invaded their lands and now they are seeking for someone who could help them to build tower defenses. Are you ready for it? Use strategic points to kill their enemies and place freezing towers, magic towers and barracks that are enough to prepare a powerful army. Do not forget to upgrade your powers to rule the land in a way you wanted in this free flash game.

You can play this latest tower defense game in your any chosen browser for free. Designed for kids from different age groups to play, Calabash Bros are sure to give you unmatched fun and thrill-some experience.
